name: GOLEM (itch) (Cat War Games)
description:
PREVIEW

This has been kicking around in my brain for a while, this project. But the OSR Jam is what brought it out. I am slightly worried it's too large in scope to finish in time, but I wanted to ensure it was in. So here is a 9-page preview of the booklet. It includes the map and the first three areas, still in development as well.
